DocumentationDefinitionList.Title: LocationPickerWidget: Ranges of the stored values

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Any string value that you will use to describe the location

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Latitude coordinate of the location as used by Google Maps. Provided as a floating point number.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Longitude coordinate of the location as used by Google Maps. Provided as a floating point number.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Height of the map that can be used when rendering the map. Given as an integer value specifying the number of pixels.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Width of the map that can be used when rendering the map. Given as an integer value specifying the number of pixels.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: The mode how the map should be rendered. Possible values are "static" or "dynamic". The value should be used to indicate if a static or a dynamic map is shown.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Type of the map that should be shown. Valid values are the types available for Google Maps, i.e., "roadmap", "satellite", "hybrid" or "terrain".

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Specifies the zoom level that should be used to display the map. Valid values are the integers from 0 to 20.
